quote: Hacking just means building something quickly or testing the boundaries of what can be done.
name: Mark Zuckerberg
title: Co-founder and CEO of Facebook

quote: Wear your failure as a badge of honor.
name: Sundar Pichai
title: CEO of Google

quote: You build your own strategy. You don't define it by what another competitor is doing.
name: Ginni Rometty
title: Former CEO of IBM

quote: Find that thing you are super passionate about.
name: Mark Zuckerberg
title: Co-founder and CEO of Facebook

quote: Marketing is too important to be left to the marketing department.
name: David Packard
title: Co-founder of Hewlett-Packard
